attributes.additional_details: Stop all immigration for a resonable period.As each country is responsable for its own benefits taxes etc it should control who it pays them to.when europe is fully integrated and has a unified tax system them free movement can be considered.For now find out via a sencus who is rightfully here.Those that are not can be put in the system to check eligabillity.After an amnesty of say 6 months any illegals will be ejected without right of appeal.As they say Fair play to all that play Fair.
